title: ‘I Start Every Season with Doubts’: Tadej Pogačar on Eve of 2025 Debut at UAE Tour
content:
Triple crown star keeps world guessing on Vuelta and Roubaix plans; UAE Tour rivals admit difficulty of taking on world champion.

Read the full article at ‘I Start Every Season with Doubts’: Tadej Pogačar on Eve of 2025 Debut at UAE Tour on Velo.
author: sstokes
